text: If we joined the Common Market, our food subsidies would probably be replaced by Budgette YOU are spending more as the summer holiday season moves into top gear.. On the eve of August Bank Holiday the spending spree is at a new all-time peak.
handwritten_text: If we joined the Common Market, our food subsidies would probably be replaced by Budgette YOU are spending more as the summer holiday season moves into top gear.. On the eve of August Bank Holiday the spending spree is at a new all-time peak.
